markdownRemark.html:
Reading Material

  • The Companion Paper of this project. Liquid Democracy in Social Choice: Reflections on the Past, Proposals for the Future
    — D. Grossi, A. Nitsche, G. Papasotiropoulos

  • A short guide to different research directions and approaches in the field for newcomers. Liquid Democracy: An Annotated Reading List
    — G. Papasotiropoulos, U. Schmidt-Kraepelin

  • An outreach and discussion journal on liquid democracy, covering approaches, perspectives, proposals, case studies, and reflections on practice and theory. The Liquid Democracy Journal

  • A comprehensive exploration of the principles and rationale behind the procedures developed for LiquidFeedback, along with broader insights into the concept and practice of liquid democracy. The Principles of Liquid Feedback
    — J. Behrens, A. Kistner, A. Nitsche, B. Swierczek

  • A YouTube channel featuring content and discussions related to liquid democracy. Interaktive Demokratie
    — Association for Interactive Democracy

  • A catalogue of existing platforms offering delegation features. List of e-Voting, Deliberation, and e-Democracy Projects
    — The Democracy Foundation

Workshops on Liquid Democracy

Toulouse, France, 2021 — R. Colley, U. Grandi
Zurich, Switzerland, 2022 — L. Heitz, C. Sarasua, M. Revel, C. Valsangiacomo
